item.description:
Please note: we had to reschedule for Saturday June 9. I am in Los Angeles, and the airline rescheduled my flight for a later time on Sunday. Sorry! Because all of the RSVPs were Maybes, and now I'm a No for Sunday, we'll just do this on Saturday instead!

Where?
Starbucks on 443 Boylston at Berkeley.

Who should come?
Rational sojourners! Anyone with an interest in Ayn Rand who would like to meet fellow admirers.

Why should people come?
To meet & drink beverages & socialize & ponder A is A and man qua man!

Should members bring anything?
Yourselves!

What's a good ice-breaker question members can ask each other?
What philosophies interested you before you learned of objectivism?

How will members find you when they get there?
I'll have dollar-sign bling bling.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Ayn Rand June Meetup
